Large Popup Window

Large modal popup for extra large content, you can do this by choosing the large modal size from shortcode features, this will apply a wider larger popup style for the modal content.

Open Modal

Large Popup Window

Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula.

Youtube Video Popup Window

Youtube video modal popup has some setup to be done, add the modal shortcode, then add a new video shortcode inside it and add the video URL Ex:Â http://www.youtube.com/embed/loFtozxZG0s", this will add the link to the youtube video iframe source.

Open Modal

Vimeo Video Popup Window

Vimeo video modal popup has some setup to be done, add the modal shortcode, then add a new video shortcode inside it and add the video URL Ex:Â “//player.vimeo.com/video/71876963", this will add the link to the Vimeo video iframe source.
